Question: Gitel Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Gitel Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Contract manufacturer in Shenzhen, China
- Offers camera modules, alarms, and other consumer electronics
- 30,000 sq. feet facility with annual sales of US$9.36M in 2023
- ISO 13485 / 9001 / ISO14001 certification
- UL qualification for some products
- Experienced engineering and sourcing teams
- Focus on engineering support for start-up companies
- State-of-the-art precision tooling workshop with ISO certifications
- Provides design, SMT, assembling, testing, and packaging services
- Clean room SMT and assembly technology
- Silicone free and BPA free production work floors
- Offers services for product design, testing fixture design, and lab services
- Focus on quality, safety, and environmental compliance
- Encourages compliance with environmental laws and energy conservation
Summary_cn:
Gitel 有限公司。

CES 2024 产品亮点：

- 中国深圳的合同制造商
- 提供摄像头模块、警报器和其他消费电子产品
- 30,000 平方英尺的设施，2023 年销售额为 936 万美元
- ISO 13485 / 9001 / ISO14001 认证
- 部分产品获得 UL 认证
- 具备经验的工程和采购团队
- 专注于为初创企业提供工程支持
- 配备有 ISO 认证的先进精密工具车间
- 提供设计、SMT 制造、组装、测试和包装服务
- 清洁室 SMT 和装配技术
- 无硅、无 BPA 的生产车间
- 提供产品设计、测试夹具设计和实验室服务
- 专注于质量、安全和环境合规性
- 鼓励遵守环境法律和节约能源。
